name: Next Tech Lab AP
description: A student-led multidisciplinary research and innovation lab at SRM University-AP focusing on cutting-edge technologies through projects, research, and collaboration.
achievements: Winner of QS Reimagine Education 2018 Award
Recognized as one of the first student-driven multidisciplinary labs at SRM AP

how_to_join.title: Attend the Expo
how_to_join.details: Join the upcoming Expo on 17–18 September 2025 to learn about projects, meet members, and express interest in joining.

how_to_join.title: Fill Out the Google Form
how_to_join.details: After the Expo, a Google Form will be shared. Fill it out with your details and interests.

how_to_join.title: Interview
how_to_join.details: Shortlisted applicants will be called for an interview to assess their enthusiasm and fit for the lab.

how_to_join.title: Task Assignment
how_to_join.details: Selected candidates will be given a small task/project to complete.

how_to_join.title: Evaluation and Onboarding
how_to_join.details: Your performance on the task will be evaluated. Successful candidates will be officially onboarded into Next Tech Lab AP.

rules_and_policies.code_of_conduct: Be respectful, avoid harassment, credit collaborators, follow university policies during on-campus activity.
rules_and_policies.attendance: Attend events you sign up for; inform leads if you cannot.
rules_and_policies.security: Do not share private data or sensitive university credentials on public channels.

resources.repositories: GitHub organization (ask core team for links)
resources.documentation: Shared Google Drive / Notion wiki (links available in Discord)

events.name: Monthly Workshop
events.purpose: Skill-building sessions led by members or guests

faq.q: Is it only for SRM students?
faq.a: Yes — it is only for SRM AP students from all fields (B.Tech and M.Tech).
No — beginners are welcome; there are study groups and mentors.
Usually free; special workshops may have material costs communicated in advance.
